oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Riverside Hoedown - Audition - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Audition for WSM program Riverside Hoedown, part 1. Featuring Ernie Keller (announcer), George Morgan (host, performer), Candy Kids (performers, including Dean on fiddle), Anita Kerr Singers (performer), Don Slayman (performer), Little Jimmy Dickens (performer), and Chet Atkins (performer). Sponsored by Bristol-Myers products Ipana and Sal Hepatica.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Anita Kerr Singers; Little Jimmy Dickens; George Morgan; Candy Kids; Chet Atkins
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Sal Hepatica / Ipana jingle (Anita Kerr Singers) -- Opening statement (Ernie Keller) -- Theme (Stay A Little Longer) (Anita Kerr Singers) -- Opening statement (George Morgan) -- Jambalaya (On the Bayou) (George Morgan) -- George Morgan and Little Jimmy Dickens talk -- I'm Little But I'm Loud (Little Jimmy Dickens) -- Sal Hepatica commercial (George Morgan, Ernie Keller) -- Sal Hepatica jingle (Anita Kerr Singers) -- George Morgan introduces Anita Kerr -- It's My Lazy Day (Anita Kerr Singers) -- George Morgan talks about New Orleans -- Birth Of The Blues (Chet Atkins guitar) -- (I Just Had A Date) A Lover's Quarrel (George Morgan) -- Ipana commercial (Ernie Keller, George Morgan) [continued in part 2]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Bristol-Myers Company; Riverside hoedown (Radio program); Keller, Ernie; Morgan, George, 1925-1975; Anita Kerr Singers; Slayman, Don (Musician); Dickens, Little Jimmy, 1920-; Atkins, Chet; Candy Kids (Musical group)
